title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 81.2 - Persons required to report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 81.2 - Persons required to report

State Regulations
(a) All persons listed in subdivision (1) of section
2803-d
of the Public Health Law are required to report, and all other persons may report, physical abuse, mistreatment or neglect in accordance with this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
81.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
